short_summary: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police have a requirement for the supply and delivery of Backpacks in Regina, Saskatchewan.
description: The Royal Mounted Canadian Police have a requirement for the supply and delivery of Backpacks in Regina, Saskatchewan. A complete list of the mandatory specifications are detailed in the Annex F.
full_summary:
========================
# Tender Notice: Back Packs

**Notice Title**
: M5000-232267 Backpacks for the Royal Canadian Mounted Police

**Notice Reference Number**
: WS3933350867-Doc3933558634

**Tender Closing Date and Time**
: April 25, 2023 at 14:00 EST

**Procurement Category**
: Goods - *Purses and handbags and bags

**Trade Agreements**
: The procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Regions of Delivery**
: *Saskatchewan*

**Notice Status**
: This tender opportunity has expired. Submission for a new tender will need to be made to a new notice.

**Contact Information**
: For more information, please contact:

*   Name: Jordan, Amanda (SPAC/PSPC)
*   Title: Procurement Officer
*   Email: amanda.jordan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
*   Phone: None
*   Fax: None

**Notice URL**
: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15821829?extsite=MTU4MjE4MjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Notice Documents**
: A copy of the Bidder’s Checklist can be downloaded from the Notice URL.

**Tender Description**
: The Royal Canadian Mounted Police requires the supply and delivery of Backpacks in Regina, Saskatchewan.  The procurement is subject to the specifications detailed in the Annex F. 

System notes: 
- The government tender notice has expired but the new tender has not been issued at this moment. Any interested party has to wait for a while until the new notice is issued.
- The procurement was originally scheduled to close on March 27
